replies.bodyText: Once I show the actual logs on the developer menu, the placeholder_logs string resource will be deleted.
replies.author: eeatonaws

replies.bodyText:
Yes!!
Consider how this text will read to a user, before that point. What is the most useful thing a user can read? The phrase "placeholder" is a UI development term for this concept. My feedback is just that the verbiage could be more user-aware.
In scenarios where the data loads quickly -- such as reading constants from the OS -- the user may never see the message.
In scenarios where the data is loaded over a crappy 4G connection and the network request takes 10 seconds, placeholder texts are crucial.
replies.author: jamesonwilliams
